senses.de: To depend on someone or something for help or support
senses.ex: She usually looks to her teacher for guidance.

Tips.title: Expecting Assistance
Tips.description: Used when someone seeks help and has confidence that help will come from a particular source.
Tips.example: Small businesses look to the government for financial aid during the crisis.

Tips.title: Direction of Hope
Tips.description: Implies a sense of hope placed in someone or something when in need.
Tips.example: Children often look to their parents when they are scared.

Tips.title: Guidance Seeking
Tips.description: Indicates seeking direction or advice from a more knowledgeable or experienced individual or entity.
Tips.example: We will look to our mentor for advice on our career paths.

senses.de: To examine or consider an issue or situation
senses.ex: We need to look to the future instead of focusing on the past.

Tips.title: Forward Thinking
Tips.description: Emphasizes an orientation towards future possibilities or outcomes.
Tips.example: In our meeting, let's look to potential growth areas.

Tips.title: Analyzing Situations
Tips.description: Can be used when carefully examining or contemplating a specific situation or event.
Tips.example: The board will look to the recent sales dip to find a solution.

Tips.title: Considerate Approach
Tips.description: Shows a thoughtful, deliberate approach to thinking about particular matters.
Tips.example: As a teacher, I often look to each student's needs individually.

senses.de: To think about or plan to do something in the future
senses.ex: He's looking to retire in a few years.

Tips.title: Future Goals
Tips.description: Indicates planning or intending to do something, often used with life events or career plans.
Tips.example: She's looking to study abroad next semester.

Tips.title: Aspiring to Change
Tips.description: Implies preparing or aiming to undertake a new venture or make a transition.
Tips.example: The company is looking to enter the Asian market next year.

Tips.title: Anticipating Transitions
Tips.description: Refers to an individual's expectation or readiness to move into a different stage or condition.
Tips.example: After years of hard work, he's looking to take a long vacation.

senses.de: To hope or expect to achieve something
senses.ex: Investors are looking to make a sizable profit.

Tips.title: Achievement Orientation
Tips.description: Conveys an intention or expectation to succeed in attaining a specific goal or outcome.
Tips.example: The athlete is looking to break the world record in the next race.

Tips.title: Profit Expectation
Tips.description: Typically used in business or investment contexts to express hope for financial gains.
Tips.example: Traders are looking to benefit from the latest market trends.

Tips.title: Strategic Hope
Tips.description: Implies a carefully planned approach to achieving a certain aim, often in business or personal growth.
Tips.example: We are looking to streamline our process to increase productivity.
